author: Ingrid Miley
title: Some businesses may close over virus redundancy claims
description: Employers affected by the Covid-19 outbreak could face a significant number of redundancy claims, the cost of which could put many of them out of business, according to informed sources.
content:
Employers affected by the Covid-19 outbreak could face a significant number of redundancy claims, the cost of which could put many of them out of business, according to informed sources.
